'''Gambler's Earrings''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Gambler]].

==Description==
These ostentatious earrings are the perfect representation of the gambler's transient wealth.<br />The glimmer of the gem is just as soothing as the sky and the lake.<br />The earrings would be coated with a mildly sedative substance to keep the gambler calm in the game.<br />In games where one gambles with life and death, remaining calm and composed is the key to winning.
